dSPACE DS1104 Workshop for Power Electronics System Applications, 16-17 October 2017
====================================================================================

by [powerpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/powerpic/ "Posts by powerpic")
 | Aug 3, 2017 | [POWER](https://fke.utm.my/category/power/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/Dspace-workshop-brouchure3-1080x470.jpg)

The Power Electronics and Drives Research Group (PEDG) of the Department of Electrical Power Engineering, Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM), in collaboration with the IEEE Power Electronics Society (PELS), will be organising the dSPACE DS1104 Workshop for Power Electronics System Applications. The details are as follows:

Date: 16-17 October 2017

Venue: Advanced Machine Lab, P07-112-01, Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, Johor Bahru.

Please contact Dr. Norjulia Mohd Nordin (e-mail: power-sc@engineering.utm.my) for further enquiries.

![dspace-workshop-brouchure2](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/Dspace-workshop-brouchure2.jpg)

Please click [here](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2017/08/Dspace-workshop-brouchure1.pdf)
 for the PDF version of the brochure.
